titleStmt.title: A proclamation concerning starch.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Announcing a commission to control manufacture of starch.
Dated at end: Salisbury the 23. day of August, in the fifth yeere of our reigne ... .
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
